LanguageData.JetHigh.label: high on Jet
LanguageData.JetHigh.description: Active Jet in the bloodstream. Generates a mild euphoric effect.
LanguageData.JetTolerance.label: Jet tolerance
LanguageData.JetTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to Jet. The more severe this tolerance is, the more psychite-based drugs like yayo or flake it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.JetAddiction.label: Jet addiction
LanguageData.JetAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to Jet. Long-term presence of psychite has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug. \nWithout regular doses of Jet from drugs like flake or yayo, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.JetAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
